sentences.text: Font Trebuchet MS: Numbers are written on top of each other
Since update from 47 the numbers 1,2,3,4 are written on top of each other when using Trebuchet MS (MY FAVOURITE!!!!!
Haven't tested all other fonts, only found this in Trebuchet so far.

Re: Font Trebuchet MS: Numbers are written on top of each other
Not reproduced with Inkscape 0.48 and 0.48+devel r10009 on OS X 10.5.8.
Does this happen when writing new text in a new (default) document?
Could you attach a sample SVG file and a screenshot of the file rendered in Inkscape, exposing this error?

Re: [Bug 705005] Re: Font Trebuchet MS: Numbers are written on top of each other
Hi,
yes, in a new document, and also in old ones.
> Not reproduced with Inkscape 0.48 and 0.48+devel r10009 on OS X 10.5.8.
> Does this happen when writing new text in a new (default) document?

> Could you attach a sample SVG file and a screenshot of the file rendered in
> Inkscape, exposing this error?

> You received this bug notification because you are a direct subscriber
> of the bug.

>  other when using Trebuchet MS (MY FAVOURITE!!!!!
>  Haven't tested all other fonts, only found this in Trebuchet so far.

- if you load this file, select the text, and switch the text to a different font like Times New Roman, does the text positioning improve?

Re: Font Trebuchet MS: Numbers are written on top of each other
- sorry, what I meant was, if you load the file 123456.svg from comment 2, and if you select the text, and switch the text to a different font like Times New Roman, does the text positioning improve?
what I was asking is if the bad positioning is unique to this font.

Re: Font Trebuchet MS: Numbers are written on top of each other
I tested this on 0.48+windows 7, and had no problem at all.
Will test the attached SVG later when I hit home.

Re: [Bug 705005] Re: Font Trebuchet MS: Numbers are written on top of each other
Hi,

But the 123456.svg is from me
originally anyway, and yes, if I change the font, the problem
disappears.
So far it only occurs with Trebuchet MS.

Tested "123456.svg" on 0.48+win 7 and found no problem.
>  if I change the font, the problem disappears.
And if you change it back to Trebuchet does the problem come back?

Re: [Bug 705005] Re: Font Trebuchet MS: Numbers are written on top of each other
Whoops, now I can't reproduce this anymore myself.
Maybe because I restarted the PC???

When the problem occured I'm quite sure that I tried to switch back to
Trebuchet and the nunbers jumped onto each other.
I had Trebuchet as my standard font.
Wonder, if I was strange or my PC :-)
